name: CVE-2022-41258
description: Due to insufficient input validation, SAP Financial Consolidation - version 1010, allows an authenticated attacker to inject malicious script when running a common query in the Web Administration Console. On successful exploitation, an attacker can view or modify information causing a limited impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability of the application.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
